## BehaviorCollection indexer

Retirns a behavior at the specified index.

```csharp
public IBehavior this[int index] { get; set; }
```

| Parameter | Description |
| --- | --- |
| index | Index of a behavior to return. |

### Return Value

Animation begavior.
